original_text: But the high places were not taken away. Nevertheless, the heart of Asa was wholly true to the Lord all his days.
korean_text: 다만 산당은 없애지 아니하니라 그러나 아사의 마음이 일평생 여호와 앞에 온전하였으며

sentences.original_text: But the high places were not taken away.
Nevertheless, the heart of Asa was wholly true to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그럼에도 불구하고, 아사의 마음은 온전히 주께 진실했으며
